title: Language Detection with API Gateway, Lambda and Comprehend
description: API Gateway REST API with Lambda function backend integration calling Comprehend service Language detection using Boto3 SDK.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates the deployment of a SAM template that builds a REST API with a Lambda function integration (proxy integration). User Calls the API endpoint, passes the input text which in turn is received by the Lambda function. This calls the Amazon Comprehend Service for detecting the language (dominant language) in a text.
